description: Ungoogled-Chromium in the rpmfusion repos. It is fast and doesn't have telemetry.
summary: One of the best browser for Linux!

description: This doesn't have telemetry, and uses the browser engine most compatible with the spaghetti monster that is the JavaScript landscape.
Really wonderful of you to support this project with an active repository. I'm a big fan of this project and really love the privacy and performance combination I get with this browser.
At this point in time, this is literally the only choice for a %100 non-zogged, fully free, and fully private web browser that is not Tor.

It's nice that ungoogled chromium is in the repos but you should rename it to ungoogled-chromium but my thoughts on ungoogled chromium it's self very fast most likely faster than normal chrome because of google bloat and also looks nice and has privacy out of the box(mostly)
summary: good but why is it called chromium-browser-privacy

description: best browser for everyone who value their freedom & privacy!

I agree that this should be renamed to "Ungoogled Chromium" but other than that this browser is perfect.

Of all the chromium forks out there Ungoogled is by far the most privacy and security sensitive, it does this without sacrificing usability, it is in most aspect a drop-in replacement of vanilla chromium.
This build includes all the codecs so you can just install it and use it like a chrome replacement too.

As a privacy nut and long time firefox user it's been hard to find something to replace it but ungoogled-chromium is the first browser that makes me feel just as safe if not safer than firefox

Make sure to install the "chromium-web-store" from github by NeverDecaf and you are golden to install any extension.
The Fedora repository version of Ungoogled Chromium has been a real lifesaver. With a couple of tweaks (found in the Github FAQ), there is no better browser available.

I use ungoogled chromium for MS Teams which sadly does not work on Firefox (I wonder why...).
It's light, quick and does what it needs to for me.
Thank you for making it easily available!
Very outdated version of Chromium unfortunately

Live-стримы заработали. Не тормозит, работает шустро, отзывчивый. Благодарю.

Какая-то проблема с установкой Ublock origin, но с этим, думаю, разберусь.
